name: NUStyle
description: NUStyle is an exclusive discount scheme for the NUS community. Just flash your matriculation/staff card to enjoy discounts at our partner stores!

name: NUSWhispers
description: Have an interesting story to share or just need to get something off your chest? Tell us your story here! No one will know it was you.

name: Bare Nusessities
description:
When studying gets boring, take a walk. Find someone and poke your nose into their business. What you get, will surprise you!

This project is about the diversity of the people in NUS. Peace.
